author: aandvalenzuela
body:
This PR contains:

1. Refactor of actions and notifications in different functions.
2. Add retry action after bringing the node off.
3. Update label of the parsed jobs when no action is taken.
4. Update job label based on the action taken by parser.
5. Add `gitErrors` category to `ib-run-pr-tests`, `build-any-ib`, `update-github-pages` and `ib-tag-and-schdule`.
title: [Jenkins parser job] Refactor parser, fix actions and add new errors
